original: In the heart of the Commonwealth, amidst the ruins of a forgotten world, it was Christmas time. Around flickering fires, parents gathered their wide-eyed children, reminiscing about the post-war tale of old Saint Nick. They spoke of a time when gifts weren't scarce, when laughter and joy filled the streets instead of ruins and uncertainty. Their eyes sparkled with the nostalgia of a world they cou
